description: Discover the incredible world of Rafa, a boy who loves to venture into his fantasy world, in which he will need your help to face a world full of obstacles and strange creatures. It's a great family game, without any violent appeal, it's just fun like the famous classic games from the 90's.
name: Rafa's World
intro: A very fun game, without any kind of violence, for the enjoyment of all ages (family friendly).
